objectives: Stand up Honeybucket on OpenClaw with one working channel
success_criteria: openclaw gateway status healthy and channel round-trip tested
requirements: Node 22.11+; OpenClaw install; API keys; one messaging account

objectives: Enforce pairing, approvals, and command/path limits
success_criteria: 100% unpaired or risky actions blocked or approval-gated; audit queue reviewed
requirements: AGENTS.md; allowlisted commands and paths; approval workflow

objectives: Build four core workflows: daily summary, task triage, reminders, and daily OpenClaw power users, updates, and trends tracker
success_criteria: Each workflow succeeds in at least two real runs; power users, updates, and trends report runs for three consecutive days
requirements: Prompt templates; memory.md; test inputs; output formats; daily trend data feed
out_of_scope: Broad agent skill marketplace; advanced multi-agent orchestration

objectives: Add one high-value integration, one recurring automation, and a project dashboard with daily event replay
success_criteria: Three successful integration runs; three scheduled automation runs without manual retry; dashboard replays the prior seven days
requirements: External API credentials; retry and fallback handling; schedule config; event timeline data

objectives: Stabilize operations and finalize launch docs
success_criteria: Seven-day no-critical-incident window; rollback drill completed; KPI report published
requirements: Incident log; runbook; security checklist; weekly review cadence
out_of_scope: 24/7 on-call model; HA or distributed deployment
